parameters.name: DeductedInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance whose fees are deducted by using the RI. If this parameter is left empty, the usage details of all instances are queried.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The time when the RI expires. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: InstanceSpec
parameters.description: The instance type of the RI.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 300.

parameters.name: RICommodityCode
parameters.description:
The code of the service to which the RI is applied. Default value: ecsRi. Valid values:

*   ecsRi: ECS RI.
*   scu_bag: storage capacity unit (SCU).

parameters.name: RIInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the RI. If this parameter is left empty, the usage details of all RIs are queried.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The time when the RI was created. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.
